ModMetaData.name: Donkey - Box Truck - Translation
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
Chinese to English translation of @RedFox_2020 and @qwqwqwq's "Donkey" Box Truck. I apologize for any mistranslations as I do not speak Chinese. Big thanks to the original authors for allowing me to do a translation for their awesome mod. I hope you guys enjoy their mod as much as I have.
If the original authors wish at any time for me to remove this from the workshop, I will comply with their request to do so.
=================================
KNOWN ISSUES:
- NONE!
=================================
If there are any other issues, please don't hesitate to let me know.
o7 - XxHyde840xX
=================================
